content: knitted shorts in drops fabel piece is knitted top down with rib and in stocking stitch size xs xxxl see all about autumn sweater pattern here 1 drops design pattern fa-517 **size** xs/s - m - l/xl - xxl /xxxl fits hips circumference approx 84/92 - 96/104 - 108/114 -118/124 cm **materials** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 200-200-200-250 g colour 922 fruit patch needles drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 and 60 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 and 60 cm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 32 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/237-36-all-about-autumn
